_comments.close_time: how long before computer turns off
_comments.show_video: whether video is shown - 0 is false, 1 is true
_comments.show_box: whether boxes around human AND time left are shown - 0 is false, 1 is true - video needs to be ON too
_comments.make_sound: whether the computer will make a sound when breach happens
_comments.delay: how long you want a delay to start from when the app opens
_comments.shut_down: whether to shut down or just keep the window until password is entered 0 false 1 true
